quest.name: The Creaky Mill Gets the Grease
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Minebern looks as though he's about to tear his hair out.
objectives: Slay a thistle mole and obtain its fat.
Deliver the thistle mole fat to Minebern.
Spread thistle mole oil on the windmill.

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: I tell you, this windmill gives me nothing but grief. The damned thing won't stop creaking!

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: Putting thistle mole oil on the...moving bits at the top, makes it turn more smoothly, and I'd get up there and do it myself if I hadn't thrown my back out. Not to mention we've used up our supply of the stuff.

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: Would you be willing to do it? There's coin in it for you.

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: It shouldn't be too hard to find thistle moles around here. Give them a few licks and they'll keel right over. Wringing the fat out is a pain in the arse, though. Once you've got a decent amount, bring it to me.

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: Chasing around after thistle moles is not the sort of thing you want to be doing with a bad back, I tell you.

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: Now there's a womanman who smells like shehe's skinned a mole or two.

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: Yes, that ought to do it. Give me a moment and I'll fix up a batch of the oil...

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: There you go, all ready. Now, be a good lasslad and climb to the top and spread this on the movey bits. Don't ask me what they're called, I didn't build the bloody thing!

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: Good work. I'm not sure if the creaking had any negative effect on the mill itself, but it was bloody annoying!

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: I suppose you're wondering what we'd need a windmill for in the first place, seeing as we've no crops to mill into flour. It's actually used for drawing up water from deep underground.

dialogue.name: MINEBERN
dialogue.text: Of course, if anything were to go wrong, we'd have a serious problem on our hands, and it's my job to make sure that doesn't happen. Anyway, here's your payment. You've earned it.
